cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with activity recognition from video, which is a common problem in computer vision and falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a novel active learning technique that utilizes context information, which involves machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of graphical inference techniques, which is a common technique in multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) research.
